predicate.note: Frames file for 'govern' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

role.descr: entity having a control or influence

example.name: transitive
example.text: For years , a strict regimen governed the staff meetings at Nissan Motor Co. 's technical center in Tokyo 's western suburbs .
example.arg: the staff meetings at Nissan Motor Co. 's technical center in Tokyo 's western suburbs

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Such a policy implies that only a black politician can speak for a black person , and that only a white politician can govern on behalf of a white one .
example.arg: on behalf of a white one

example.name: passive
example.text: Study after study -- the most recent from the Brookings Institution -- tells us that the best schools are those that [*T*-1] are free of outside interference and are governed [*-2] by a powerful head .
